Header: Bush Fire in Kaluambathenna Brought Under Control
Content: Troops of the Security Force Headquarters - Central (SFHQ-C) a few days ago (10) rose to the occasion and doused a bush fire that erupted in the general area of Kaluambathenna, Diyathalawa in the Bandarawela District around 5.30 pm on the instructions of Major General Laksiri Waduge, Commander, Security Forces - Central. 1 Officer and 21 Army personnel took part in the efforts and the fire was brought under control within an hour. Several people in the area to also assisted the operation.
